title: Trying to verify my google business listing, I received the postcard and listing suspended immediate
content:
I received my postcard for a local locksmith company, I entered my verification pin and my listing instantly became suspended, I expected it as all locksmith listing get suspended automatically. Sent in the appeal form and was asked to submit licenses/registration upon doing so I received a message back this morning at around 6am stating my business is ineligible to appear on google maps and google search as to quality guidelines. I know I have no violated anything and wondering why they will not accept license. Info is

Metro Lock And Key
Canton, Mi, 48187
(734) 444-8364

Business hours are 6am-12pm 7 days a week, I had it verified for over 6mnths and it was taken down by google I was asked by google to delete that entire listing and start over with a different email, not sure why they requested I do this but here I am....
